scripts.build: npm install && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.static-node: node -e "const http=require('http');const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');http.createServer((req,res)=>{let file='./dist'+(req.url==='/'?'/index.html':req.url);fs.readFile(file,(err,data)=>{if(err){res.writeHead(404);res.end('Not Found');}else{res.writeHead(200,{'Content-Type':path.extname(file)==='.css'?'text/css':path.extname(file)==='.js'?'application/javascript':'text/html'});res.end(data);}})}).listen(3000);console.log('Static server running at http://localhost:3000');"
